CustomField.description: The very specific strategies & measurable tactics that make up an actual deal with the partner that will drive us toward the objective. Example: By listing USDC as the preferred remittance option in the app and running a blended email and in-app marketing feature on USDC education, we and the partner believe we can drive a significant uplift in both USDC on platform and MEWs.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The very specific strategies & measurable tactics that make up an actual deal with the partner that will drive us toward the objective. Example: By listing USDC as the preferred remittance option in the app and running a blended email and in-app marketing feature on USDC education, we and the partner believe we can drive a significant uplift in both USDC on platform and MEWs.
CustomField.label: Method
